alert.note: Alert for Ketchikan Gateway Borough; Prince of Wales Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 11:53PM AKST until January 16 at 3:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Up to 2 additional inches of snow accumulation is expected by 3 AM AKST. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Prince of Wales Island and Ketchikan Gateway Borough. * WHEN...Until 3 AM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snowfall accumulations expected to continue until 3 AM AKST.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. People are urged to prepare their property before the onset of winter weather. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Ketchikan Gateway Borough; Prince of Wales Island
